qas.question: Which nation was permitted rearmament by the foundation of the Warsaw Pact?

context: One of the founding members, <a0_0><b2_0>East Germany<b2_0/><a0_0/> was allowed to re-arm by the <b3_0>Soviet Union<b3_0/> and <a1_0>the <b4_0><b5_0>National People's Army<b5_0/><b4_0/><a1_0/> was established as the armed forces of the country to counter the rearmament of West Germany.
